messages.content:
### FAQ – Clearing Cache to Resolve UI Glitches

**Q1: How do I clear the cache on my SmartHome Hub?**
A: Open **Settings** > **System** > **Advanced** > **Clear Cache**. Confirm the prompt. The hub will restart its UI services automatically and the cache will be cleared.

**Q2: Why does clearing the cache fix UI glitches?**
A: Cached UI assets can become outdated after firmware updates or prolonged use, leading to flickering, lag, or visual artifacts. Clearing the cache forces the hub to reload fresh UI files, eliminating those glitches.

**Q3: What should I expect after clearing the cache?**
A: The hub will briefly restart the UI (usually 10–30 seconds). Your settings and configurations remain unchanged. In most cases, the UI stabilises within 2–3 minutes.
